Attacks.Name: Shadow Ball
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character gains the Stun special condition.

Attacks.Name: Phantom Force
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt.

Attacks.Name: Ominous Wind
Attacks.Effect: This attack targets all characters within Range 2 of the point of impact. If a wild is rolled, characters hit by this attack suffer the Stun special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Ethereal Form
Superpowers.Effect: Specteon can use this power to phase through terrain and characters during its next movement.

Superpowers.Name: Haunting Presence
Superpowers.Effect: Choose an enemy character within Range 3. That character loses 2 power, and Specteon gains 2 power.

Attacks.Name: Poltergeist
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character drops all objectives they are holding.

Attacks.Name: Spectral Scream
Attacks.Effect: This attack causes Fear in the target character if a wild is rolled, reducing their attack dice by 1 on their next turn.
